resources.string:
• Added this dialog!
  • Decline reasons added to decline dialog
  • Rate a buyer dialog after work is completed
  • Bullet point support to work order descriptions
  • Work order search by status, location and distance
  • Updated Terms and Conditions
  • Added PQAP policy to settings

• Fixed crashes caused by rotating the phone while uploading photos
  • Fixed app getting stuck in retry loop while downloading files

• New look and feel
  • More work order search options
